name: Don't Scrap Food
description:
In a literal fast food restaurant, try your best to satisfy the seemingly endless flow of clients coming to eat! But beware, if you end up killing them with fast food or too many dishes go to waste, you'll be fired!

Developed for Isart Digital's "Game Week" game jam.

Artists:

Julien Duroi :  https://www.artstation.com/julien_duroi01
Floriane Madery :  https://www.artstation.com/mydare
Léa Gaudin :  https://www.artstation.com/gaudin_lea
Alan Guenard :  https://www.artstation.com/guenard_alan
Mailys Beltai :  https://www.artstation.com/skyllha
